title: Columbia Women's Lillian Ridge Shell
features: WATERPROOF RAINCOAT: You’ll love our Columbia Lillian Ridge Shell featuring a nylon polyester blend fabric with a mesh lining that offers comfortable wet-weather protection
EVERYDAY JACKET: When the weather is on the edge… a bit cool, a bit windy, a bit wet, this is a universal jacket that will get you through
TAILORED STYLE: With a shirttail hem and a comfortable cut, you can tailor the look and fit with the adjustable cinch at the waist, reducing drafts while adding a touch of style

HANDY FEATURES: This women's rain coat features a convenient drawcord adjustable hood, drawcord adjustable waist, partial elastic cuff, drop tail, shirttail hem, snaps at side seams, and hand pockets with snap closures

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting jacket you will enjoy for seasons to come.
description: You can't avoid the rain—but you can look good in it. This waterproof jacket has a classic silhouette, with a roomy hood, a drawcord waist, and a shirttail hem with side snaps. It might just have you hoping for stormy weather.   Crafted of our waterproof nylon and polyester blend, this rain coat keeps its promise of protection. It includes an adjustable hood, an adjustable waist, while two snap-closed side pockets give a sense of protection. The elastic cuffs and drop tail design keep the elements out. Rainy-day excursions have never been so effortless.   This rain jacket is available in multiple colors and sizes. Available in extended sizing. Regular Fit. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
